name: Counten- Sale Counter Advanced
author: Nazmus Shadhat

sections.description:
Add more power to your Easy Digital download Product. Give sale with counter with that plugin.

Counten- Sale Counter Advanced Plugin for Easy Digital Downloads

Built-in Sale Features with counter. You can show the counter on product details sidebar.

Counten- Options

Counten Option is available under settings. You will be able to change your desired settings from there.

Easy Digital Downloads is Required For this Plugin
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can i find the option

Counten option will available under settings.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! You need install EDD plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Perchantage issue fixed
  • Variable product support added

1.0

  • Initial Launch
